Texts.Chs: 干的不错，这是我承诺的奖励，相信这个科技可以更好的帮助你生存。
Texts.Eng: As promised, your reward. May this tech serve you well!

Texts.Chs: 把^orange;高级筛粉机^reset;带回^orange;科学前哨站^reset;给^green;我^reset;。
Texts.Eng: Bring the ^orange;Powder Sifter^reset; to ^green;me^reset; at the ^orange;Science Outpost^reset;

Texts.Chs: 我听说过一个叫做^orange;高级筛粉机^reset;的机器，但我从来没有使用过它。在你的^orange;能源设备制造器^reset;中^orange;建造一个^reset;并带给我，完事后也许我会帮你做些什么。
Texts.Eng: I've heard of ^orange;powder sifters^reset; before but have never seen one in action. ^orange;Build one^reset; in a ^orange;Power Station^reset; and bring it to me, and maybe I'll help you out.
